description:
Professional presentation countdown timer for conferences and events

TikTak is a professional countdown timer designed specifically for presentations, conferences, and events.
Features include customizable timer settings, multi-screen support, position persistence, fullscreen mode,
WASD keyboard positioning, system tray integration, and a clean professional interface.
Version 1.1.0
- Position persistence: Timer position and screen selection now saved and restored
- Fullscreen and small timer synced across screens via Win+Shift+Arrow
- Fixed negative countdown display in fullscreen (centered minus sign)
- Prevented dropdown value changes on scroll in settings
- Updated About window with new features
- Default button now resets screen and position settings
